formElement.label: Working Directory
formElement.documentation: Indicate the directory where the jtest file resides. (Required)

formElement.label: Jtest File Type:
formElement.documentation: Select the extension of the jtest file that will be executed: gtp, ctp, or ptp.

formElement.label: Jtest File
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the jtest file to be executed. (Required)

formElement.label: Report File
formElement.documentation: Provide the path of the report in a specified file type xml, ascii or html.

formElement.label: Rules Directory
formElement.documentation: Indicate the directory to use as the RuleWizard rules directory.

formElement.label: Additional Options
formElement.documentation: Provide any additional options for the jtest command.
